text: Nokudaro, pavakarambirwa naye (Josefa), vakasangana pachihwande. Mukoma wavo mukuru akati: “Hamuzivi here kuti baba venyu vakatora kupika kwenyu nemuzita raAllah, uye mushure makatadza mubasa renyu naJosefa? Nokudaro handisikubuda munyika ino kusvika baba vangu vanditendera, kana kuti Allah vatonga panyaya yangu (nekuregedza Benjamini), uye ndivo mutongi wakanaka.”
